My Work


Breakout

Breakout is a playable classic arcade video game. Your mission is to destroy all the blocks using the ball that will bounce back at you. You need to reflect it back by moving the paddle by pressing left or right on your keybord.

Crystal Collector Game

To start the game, simply click on a crystal. The premise of the game is for the user to collect crystals with hidden values, and upon clicking them, their values are added to a score box. Once a score is equivalent to the random target score determined at the beginning of the game, the user wins.

Friend Finder

This dating application will find you the perfect date. Just take the personality test and let us work our magic! Take the survey so we can find your a great match!!
